attributes.action: incrementaly increase tax for every additional (non primary) house/flat purchased
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Housing investments pay for themselves and generate profit, penalising the young, elderly, unemployed and in lower revenue bands, making it impossible to ever acquire property, making them dependent on renting and/or debt.Owners should be taxed normally for their primary habitation, then incrementaly taxed for any additional property, in order to reduce the appeal of property investments, restauring reason in property prices and allowing more people on the property ladder.
